message: I'm excited to offer you this incredible product at a special price. I think you'll really love it!
Thank you for the offer, Alice. While I'm interested, I'm looking to spend closer to $8500. Would you be willing to consider that?
I understand you're looking to get a good deal, but I have to make a living. I can do $9500, which is the lowest I can go. It's still a great price considering the product's value to you is $12000.
